General.Name: ShoulderUP Technology Acquisition Corp
General.Description: ShoulderUp Technology Acquisition Corp. does not have significant operations. It focuses on effecting a merger, capital stock exchange, asset acquisition, stock purchase, reorganization, or related business combination with one or more businesses. The company intends to focuses on identifying businesses in technology and cybersecurity. ShoulderUp Technology Acquisition Corp. was incorporated in 2021 and is based in Kennesaw, Georgia.
